item.name: system_create_bad_request system_id not equals to app_code

exec: pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Error:Field validation for 'NameEn' failed on the 'required' tag");

body.raw:
[
    {
        "id": "biz_add",
        "name": "",
        "name_en": "biz_create",
        "description": " desc",
        "description_en": "biz_create desc en",        
        "type": "create",
        "version": 1
    },
    {
        "id": "biz_add",
        "name": "",
        "name_en": "biz_create",
        "description": " desc",
        "description_en": "biz_create desc en",        
        "type": "create",
        "version": 1
    }
]
